title: Above Your Head - Novel Updates
tags: Aliens   Arranged Marriage   Artifacts   Artificial Intelligence   Calm Protagonist   Conditional Power   Cosmic Wars   Demi-Humans   Evil Gods   Family   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Heroes   Hiding True Abilities   Magic   Male Protagonist   Military   Multiple POV   Mysterious Family Background   Mysterious Past   Outer Space   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Trauma   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Sealed Power   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Wars   Weak Protagonist
author: Park geon   박건
description:
Kwan Dae-ha.

A second-year high school student who looks ordinary but is not ordinary.

He has a secret he couldn’t tell anyone…

And it was that he was able to see the ‘Affiliation’ and ‘State’ above the heads of the people.

Is this world where people’s titles are visible real?

It was already tough as it was, but he keeps getting entangled with his ability and extraterrestrial beings!

Today, the boy dreams of peace.

…Although it will be hard.>
